testcase.name: login will success with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given user is navigated to website "http://localhost:5050/".................passed Then user is on "Login" page................................................passed When user enters username as "admin"........................................passed And user enters password as "admin".........................................passed And user clicks on "SignIn" button..........................................passed Then user is navigated to "Dashboard" page..................................passed

testcase.name: login will not success with invalid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given user is navigated to website "http://localhost:5050/".................passed Then user is on "Login" page................................................passed When user enters username as "admin"........................................passed And user enters password as "adminadmin"....................................passed And user clicks on "SignIn" button..........................................passed Then error notification "Incorrect Username or password" is displayed.......passed

testcase.name: login will not success with invalid credentials 2
testcase.system-out: Given user is navigated to website "http://localhost:5050/".................passed Then user is on "Login" page................................................passed When user enters username as "admin"........................................passed And user clicks on "SignIn" button..........................................passed Then error validation "Please input your password!" is display..............passed

testcase.system-out: Given user is navigated to website "http://localhost:5050/".................passed Then user is on "Login" page................................................passed When user enters password as "admin"........................................passed And user clicks on "SignIn" button..........................................passed Then error validation "Please input your username!" is display..............passed
